channel.title: How To Add Item's To Server
channel.description:
Difficulty level: 2/10 This is simple! Anyone can do it :eek: Here we go... :cool:
[size=12pt]Step One:[/size] Open source > Config > Item [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee408/zack1rox/1-13.jpg[/img] Or: [code]item = 35 Armadyl_godsword This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur. 500 500 500 0 160 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8[/code]
[size=12pt]Step Two:[/size] Copy any code and today ill show you how to add ags :) [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee408/zack1rox/2-11.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Step Three:[/size] At the bottum of your list type in item code: item = [item id here] examine: what ever here. Then the stats: 500 500 500 0 160 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8
Then when your done, combile Hope this works I added vesta long to mine Should look like: [code]item = 9802 Vesta's_longsword Beast_sword. 480 480 480 0 150 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8[/code]
[size=24pt][font=verdana]This tutorial is nooby. Its basic Talk Shit Get Hit ;)[/font][/size]

item.title: How To Add Item's To Server
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

Difficulty level: 2/10
This is simple! Anyone can do it :eek:
Here we go…

[size=12pt]Step One:[/size]
Open source > Config > Item

1-13.jpg903×424

Or:

item = 35	Armadyl_godsword	This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur.	500	500	500	0	160	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	140	8

[size=12pt]Step Two:[/size]
Copy any code and today ill show you how to add ags

2-11.jpg1018×95

[size=12pt]Step Three:[/size]
At the bottum of your list type in item code:
item = [item id here]
examine: what ever here.
Then the stats: 500 500 500 0 160 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8

Then when your done,
combile
Hope this works
I added vesta long to mine
Should look like:

item = 9802	Vesta's_longsword	Beast_sword.	480	480	480	0	150	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	140	8

[size=24pt][font=verdana]This tutorial is nooby.
Its basic
Talk Shit Get Hit ;)[/font][/size]

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add Item's To Server
